Barcode required: A barcode/QR code must be detected before accepting.
Camera access denied: Camera access denied. Please allow camera permissions.
Camera not available: Camera is not available on this device.
This field captures images with full aud: Images are immutable, timestamped, and audit-logged with SHA-256 hash, user identity, GPS, and device info.
Confirm Delete: Are you sure? The audit record will be preserved.
Optional GPS embedding: Optional GPS coordinate embedding per capture
Optional jsQR integration: Optional jsQR integration for barcode/QR scanning
Uses NocoBase file-manager: Uses NocoBase file-manager (Local, S3, Ali-OSS, TX-COS)
